name: Movies That Have Been Re-Made Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'Of Human Bondage' was re-made with Kim Novak and Laurence Harvey. Bette Davis starred in the original; who was her male co-star?
questions.explanation:
Leslie Howard.

	'Gone With the Wind' wasn't his only movie

questions.text: 'Of Mice and Men' was recently re-made with John Malkovich. Who starred in the original?
questions.explanation:
Burgess Meredith.

	From John Steinbeck's novel

questions.text: 'Mutiny on the Bounty' was re-made by both Mel Gibson and Marlon Brando, but the original is the best version. Who was NOT in it?
questions.explanation:
Alec Guinness.

	Good Gable, great Laughton (as Bligh), young Tone. Super movie.

questions.text: 'King Kong' was re-made with Jessica Lange. Who was in the original version?
questions.explanation:
Fay Wray.

	What other movies did she make?

questions.text: 'Cape Fear' was re-made a while ago, with Nick Nolte. Who starred in the original?
questions.explanation:
Robert Mitchum.

	Good job, With Gregory Peck.

questions.text: Bette Midler did a re-make of 'Stella Dallas'. Who starred as Stella in the 1937 version?
questions.explanation:
Barbara Stanwyck.

	One of her most well-known roles

questions.text: Steve Martin did a re-make of 'Father of the Bride'. Who played the father in the original?
questions.explanation:
Spencer Tracy.

	With a young Liz Taylor as the bride.

questions.text: 'D.O.A.' was re-made with Dennis Quaid. Who starred in the original?
A classic mystery has been done several times as both 'And Then There Were None' and 'Ten Little Indians'. Who wrote the novel?
questions.explanation:
Agatha Christie.

	One of her best works.

questions.text: 'The Thomas Crown Affair' was re-done with Pierce Brosnan in the lead. Who starred in the original with Steve McQueen?
